pullrequest.title: Display physics properties on Scene Tree

content.raw: it would be nice to avoid duplicate code between rounding numbers and arrays. One way would be to create a `roundArray` function that calls a `roundNumber` function in a for loop. We can keep this `round` function which just does type checking and calls the relevant `roundXXX` function.
content.html: it would be nice to avoid duplicate code between rounding numbers and arrays. One way would be to create a roundArray function that calls a roundNumber function in a for loop. We can keep this round function which just does type checking and calls the relevant roundXXX function.
